resources.string: Something went wrong when attempting to register device, please try again
Please start adding guardians to invite to your policy
Share these links with your guardians to continue setting up your policy
The invitation link used for guardianship is missing policy data.\n\nPlease request a new link from the policy owner and try again.
Successful biometry authentication is required to use this app
You have been invited to Vault as a guardian,\nto accept guardianship please enter the verification code
You have declined guardianship, to restart this process have the owner of the policy send you a new invite
Guardian setup complete, no further action required at this time
Received shard from owner, encrypting shard and updating policy data...
To decline Guardianship, tap the button below
Display this QR code for the owner of social policy to scan
Please enter the code provided by the Vault owner
Waiting for owner to verify the code.
The code you entered is not correct. Please try again.
Code not approved. Please send new verification code.
Code sent to owner, waiting for them to approve.
